script.name: plugin.LI.FDN.Menu.Dock.Details
script.description: FDNv8 - Dock Detail Menu for TC

line.comment: * This script builds the Dock Details Menu and retuns the array back to the Main Menu
* - menu - This is the menu array from the Main Menu
* - ware.show.array - This array hold the values of what Ware Type is displayed or hiden
* Fetch values saved in the AL Plugin global variable:
* The ID code of the DC is used as a reference in naming the global variable

line.text: add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu info line to array

line.comment: * This call the plugin.LI.FDN.Sort.Wares which returns a wares arrays sorted by type
* $sorted.ware.array[x][x] is the sorted Ware Array for the Main Type
* Create and size show ware array

line.text: add custom menu heading to array

line.comment: * Start of While Loop with 1 nested While Loop - First loop is Main Type
* Fetch main.type and ware.array from sorted.ware.array
* if ware.show.array for the main type is null set to 1 (1 = show 2 = hide)
* Call the Sub which updates builds the ware header by main type
* Calls the global variable for the dynamic menu created by plugin.LI.FDN.Menu.Dock.Details_D
* Dock ID code and Ware are used to call the unique global variable

line.text: add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * This Sub is used to create the wares header by main type

sval.val: FDNv8 - Dock Detail Menu for TC
This script builds the Dock Details Menu and retuns the array back to the Main Menu
- menu - This is the menu array from the Main Menu
- ware.show.array - This array hold the values of what Ware Type is displayed or hiden
Fetch values saved in the AL Plugin global variable
The ID code of the DC is used as a reference in naming the global variable
This call the plugin.LI.FDN.Sort.Wares which returns a wares arrays sorted by type
$sorted.ware.array[x][x] is the sorted Ware Array for the Main Type
Create and size show ware array
Start of While Loop with 1 nested While Loop - First loop is Main Type
Fetch main.type and ware.array from sorted.ware.array
if ware.show.array for the main type is null set to 1 (1 = show 2 = hide)
Call the Sub which updates builds the ware header by main type
Calls the global variable for the dynamic menu created by plugin.LI.FDN.Menu.Dock.Details_D
Dock ID code and Ware are used to call the unique global variable
This Sub is used to create the wares header by main type
